c: To host websites and serve web content

ques: What is the purpose of the alt attribute in an HTML image tag?
c: To provide alternative text for the image
d: To apply CSS styles to the image
ans: To provide alternative text for the image

ques: What is the difference between localStorage and sessionStorage in HTML5?
a: localStorage stores data temporarily, sessionStorage stores data permanently
b: localStorage is accessible across different browser tabs, sessionStorage is not
c: localStorage stores data with no expiration date, sessionStorage stores data for the duration of the page session
d: localStorage is synchronous, sessionStorage is asynchronous
ans: localStorage stores data with no expiration date, sessionStorage stores data for the duration of the page session

ques: What is the purpose of a JavaScript framework like React or Angular?
c: To handle client-side interactions and state
ans: To handle client-side interactions and state
